name: View Compliance Record Detail - Contractor
description: As a contractor user, I can view detailed compliance information for my company's records through a dedicated read-only detail page

background.text: I am logged in as a contractor user
I am on the Compliance Dashboard
compliance records are available in the list view

scenarios.name: Successfully navigate to compliance record detail page

steps.text: I can see compliance records in the list view
I click the View button for a compliance record
I should be navigated to the Compliance Record Detail page
the page header should display "Compliance Record Detail"

scenarios.name: Compliance record detail page displays in read-only mode

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
all information should be displayed in read-only mode
no edit buttons should be visible
no input fields should be editable

scenarios.name: Requirements section is hidden for contractor users

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record detail as a contractor
the Requirements section should not be visible
only basic compliance information should be displayed

scenarios.name: Basic compliance information is visible to contractor

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I should see basic compliance information
compliance status should be displayed
record dates should be visible

scenarios.name: Back navigation returns to compliance dashboard

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I click the back navigation button
I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
the compliance records list should be displayed

scenarios.name: View button functions correctly from different list positions

steps.text: multiple compliance records are displayed in the list
I click the View button for the first record
the correct compliance record details should be displayed
I navigate back to the list
I click the View button for the last record
the correct different compliance record details should be displayed

scenarios.name: Cannot access edit functionality through URL manipulation

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I attempt to access edit mode through URL modification
I should remain in read-only mode
no edit capabilities should be available

scenarios.name: Error handling when compliance record not found

steps.text: I attempt to view a non-existent compliance record
the system cannot find the requested record
I should see an appropriate error message
I should be redirected back to the compliance dashboard

scenarios.name: Access denied when unauthorized to view specific record

steps.text: I attempt to view a compliance record I am not authorized to access
the system checks my permissions
I should see an access denied message
I should not be able to view the record details

scenarios.name: Page behavior when no compliance data available

steps.text: I am viewing a compliance record with no detailed data
the compliance record detail page loads
I should see an appropriate message indicating no data available
the page should remain in read-only mode

scenarios.name: Page loads correctly with minimum required compliance data

steps.text: a compliance record exists with only minimum required fields
I click the View button for this record
the page should load successfully
the minimum compliance information should be displayed

scenarios.name: Page handles compliance records with maximum data fields

steps.text: a compliance record exists with all possible data fields populated
I click the View button for this record
the page should load without performance issues
all appropriate contractor-visible fields should be displayed properly
I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
I use browser back button to navigate away
I use browser forward button to return
the page should still be in read-only mode
no edit capabilities should be available

gherkin_content:
Feature: View Compliance Record Detail - Contractor
  As a contractor user, I can view detailed compliance information for my company's records through a dedicated read-only detail page

  Background:
    Given I am logged in as a contractor user
    And I am on the Compliance Dashboard
    And compliance records are available in the list view

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Successfully navigate to compliance record detail page
    Given I can see compliance records in the list view
    When I click the View button for a compliance record
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Record Detail page
    And the page header should display "Compliance Record Detail"

  @positive @read-only
  Scenario: Compliance record detail page displays in read-only mode
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    Then all information should be displayed in read-only mode
    And no edit buttons should be visible
    And no input fields should be editable

  @positive @permissions
  Scenario: Requirements section is hidden for contractor users
    Given I am viewing a compliance record detail as a contractor
    Then the Requirements section should not be visible
    And only basic compliance information should be displayed

  @positive @content
  Scenario: Basic compliance information is visible to contractor
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    Then I should see basic compliance information
    And compliance status should be displayed
    And record dates should be visible

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: Back navigation returns to compliance dashboard
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    When I click the back navigation button
    Then I should be returned to the Compliance Dashboard list view
    And the compliance records list should be displayed

  @positive @list-interaction
  Scenario: View button functions correctly from different list positions
    Given multiple compliance records are displayed in the list
    When I click the View button for the first record
    Then the correct compliance record details should be displayed
    When I navigate back to the list
    And I click the View button for the last record
    Then the correct different compliance record details should be displayed

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Cannot access edit functionality through URL manipulation
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    When I attempt to access edit mode through URL modification
    Then I should remain in read-only mode
    And no edit capabilities should be available

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Error handling when compliance record not found
    Given I attempt to view a non-existent compliance record
    When the system cannot find the requested record
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And I should be redirected back to the compliance dashboard

  @negative @permissions
  Scenario: Access denied when unauthorized to view specific record
    Given I attempt to view a compliance record I am not authorized to access
    When the system checks my permissions
    Then I should see an access denied message
    And I should not be able to view the record details

  @negative @empty-state
  Scenario: Page behavior when no compliance data available
    Given I am viewing a compliance record with no detailed data
    When the compliance record detail page loads
    Then I should see an appropriate message indicating no data available
    And the page should remain in read-only mode

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Page loads correctly with minimum required compliance data
    Given a compliance record exists with only minimum required fields
    When I click the View button for this record
    Then the page should load successfully
    And the minimum compliance information should be displayed

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: Page handles compliance records with maximum data fields
    Given a compliance record exists with all possible data fields populated
    When I click the View button for this record
    Then the page should load without performance issues
    And all appropriate contractor-visible fields should be displayed properly

  @edge-case @navigation
  Scenario: Browser navigation maintains read-only state
    Given I am on the Compliance Record Detail page
    When I use browser back button to navigate away
    And I use browser forward button to return
    Then the page should still be in read-only mode
    And no edit capabilities should be available
